## Discussion

The items in an [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection] may include nested item collections. Use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/getFlattenedItemList] when you need a flat array that contains individual annotations and overlays.

Access the original GeoJSON data in the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/data] object. To retrieve the data as MapKit JS items, use the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/items] or [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/getFlattenedItemList] objects.

# getFlattenedItemList()

**Instance Method**

A flattened array of items that includes annotations and overlays.

## Declaration

```swift
getFlattenedItemList(): (Annotation | Overlay)[];
```

## Discussion

The items in an [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection] may include nested item collections. Use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/getFlattenedItemList] when you need a flat array that contains individual annotations and overlays.

Access the original GeoJSON data in the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/data] object. To retrieve the data as MapKit JS items, use the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/items] or [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ItemCollection/getFlattenedItemList] objects.

## Item collection properties

- **data**: The raw GeoJSON data.
- **items**: A nested list of annotations, overlays, and other item collections.

items.description: A nested list of annotations, overlays, and other item collections.
items.name: items
